member.name: T:BookPubDB.DTOs.CoverDto
member.summary: Represents a data transfer object (DTO) for a book cover. This DTO is used to transfer cover-related data between different layers of the application while maintaining encapsulation and separation of concerns.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.CoverDto.DesignIdeas
member.summary: Gets or sets the design ideas for the book cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.CoverDto.DigitalOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cover is only available in digital format.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.CoverDto.Artists
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of artist IDs associated with the book cover.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.CoverDto.BookId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the book associated with the cover.
